content: Hello,I need a 400$ loan, for a period of 2 weeks, to be paid on 7th December, i will get my income at this day so i can pay backLoan Amount: 400Loan Purpose: PersonalLoan Repay Amount: 450 usdtLoan Repay Date: On or before December 7Type of Collateral: NoneTRC20 - USDT address: TMztk1oWm58LhXGyHP16bmnR8vJnRiLunu Binance ID: 11699666

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: From 100,000 USDT  a couple of years back to first 350 USDT and now 400 USDT boy you really have a lot going on in your mindAt one point, you even tried to borrow 5 BTC? What is wrong with you?Your first two post history pages are littered with loan requests and long term offers

comments.author: Ber86
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on November 23, 2023, 12:44:30 AMFrom 100,000 USDT  a couple of years back to first 350 USDT and now 400 USDT boy you really have a lot going on in your mindAt one point, you even tried to borrow 5 BTC? What is wrong with you?Your first two post history pages are littered with loan requests and long term offers You should have checked carefully, these old proposals were to attract a partner, an investor perhaps, in other words, these proposals were related to business, these days starting from scratch and in a garage is not so easy, we burn our own money, this recent proposal is a personal loan as indicate, nothing wrong with that, I think.
